page.title: 17After School
page.content: {Chari-}After school I get off the bus at Logie,get changed and have my tea.I get spocky,my pony,tacked up.Tony, my friend goes on Tess,my mum's horse,and the pair of us go down to Kilmany to see our friends.After the hack we groom the horses and I play with the girls in Dungeons and Dragons,my gang hut.I hardly ever watch tv in the evenings except for Wednesdays when I watch Dallas.I go to bed about 8.30. {John-}As soon as I get home from school I get changed,and go up to the farm to look for the tractor man sometimes I speak on his CB radio mostly to Blue Circle or Rabbit Catcher.I have my tea at 5.00. After tea I cut the grass with the sheers or help Dad shift the animals from one field to another.If it rains I watch T.V. and go to bed at 8.00.
